desc: We are the only Amazake speciality manufacturer in the U.S. Our mission is to provide this traditional Japanese super-drink to your table for your health and pleasure! We offer Amazake, Vegan Amazake Latte, Koji, Koji Powder, and Koji Spores.

layout.text: Bring this 1400 year tradition to your modern table in drinks, snacks & cooking. Experiment!
